about_the_game:
Halloween is a great time to take a new look at the familiar city locations. We are presenting our first free DLC, and it’s Halloween-themed!

Choose your car, get behind the wheel, fasten your seatbelt and hit the gas!

Be as focused on the road as usual, but don’t forget about the streets either, for you may miss a lot of exciting things! Pay attention to the pedestrians even if you thought you knew them so well. Read the signs and posters you came to ignore. And look up at the evening and night sky more often...

We will not reveal all the surprises that we have prepared for you, to avoid spoiling your fun of finding them, but here're some hints:

➜ Take a look at pedestrians, recently they seemed so familiar to you.
➜ Lampposts... It seems last night someone vandalized them.
➜ The night sky, it is so... scary, isn't it?
➜ Do you focus on the road usually and do not pay attention to signboards and billboards? Well, you should.

And, of course, in this version we have worked to improve performance.
detailed_description:
Halloween is a great time to take a new look at the familiar city locations. We are presenting our first free DLC, and it’s Halloween-themed!

Choose your car, get behind the wheel, fasten your seatbelt and hit the gas!

Be as focused on the road as usual, but don’t forget about the streets either, for you may miss a lot of exciting things! Pay attention to the pedestrians even if you thought you knew them so well. Read the signs and posters you came to ignore. And look up at the evening and night sky more often...

We will not reveal all the surprises that we have prepared for you, to avoid spoiling your fun of finding them, but here're some hints:

➜ Take a look at pedestrians, recently they seemed so familiar to you.
➜ Lampposts... It seems last night someone vandalized them.
➜ The night sky, it is so... scary, isn't it?
➜ Do you focus on the road usually and do not pay attention to signboards and billboards? Well, you should.

And, of course, in this version we have worked to improve performance.
name: City Car Driving - Halloween

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual Core 3.2 GHz / AMD Athlon II X4 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 240 / nVidia GeForce GT 740
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0
  • Additional Notes: WARNING!!! Correct program operation on laptops and on computers with integrated video cards is not guaranteed! Recommended system requirements for the Oculus Rift & HTC Vive are determined by the equipment manufacturer.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz / AMD FX 4xxx 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 250X / nVidia GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0
  • Additional Notes: WARNING!!! Correct program operation on laptops and on computers with integrated video cards is not guaranteed! Recommended system requirements for the Oculus Rift & HTC Vive are determined by the equipment manufacturer.

short_description: Halloween is a great time to take a new look at the familiar city locations. We are presenting our first free DLC, and it’s Halloween-themed!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Czech, Japanese, Russian*, Ukrainian, Danish, Finnish, Dutch, Greek, Polish
*languages with full audio support
